Instruction: 'Slice the bagel in half and toast until golden brown.'
'Cook the bacon in a skillet over medium heat until crispy. Remove and drain on paper towels.'
In the same skillet, fry the egg to your desired doneness, seasoning with salt and pepper.'
'Place the cooked egg on one half of the bagel.'
'Sprinkle shredded cheddar cheese over the bacon.'
'Cover with the other half of the bagel.'
Serve immediately and enjoy your classic bacon, egg, and cheese bagel!'
